query.statement:
SELECT '' CHK, '' FLAG, A.UPN, A.CST, A.PJT, A.HNO, A.VKGRP, MAX(A.VKGRP_NM) VKGRP_NM, A.ARA, MAX(A.ARA_NM) ARA_NM, A.BSU, MAX(A.BSU_NM) BSU_NM, SUM(A.CNT) CNT, MAX(A.SPT) SPT, MAX(A.ADR) ADR, A.GNO, MAX(A.ADT) ADT, MAX(A.USD) USD, MAX(A.UMR) UMR, MAX(A.RDT) RDT, MAX(A.CTP) CTP, MAX(A.JUJ) JUJ, MAX(A.JUJ_NM) JUJ_NM, 0 MC0, SUM(A.MC1) MC1, SUM(A.MC2) MC2, SUM(A.NETWR) NTR, MAX(A.SDT) SDT, MAX(A.ETP) ETP, MAX(A.CMD) CMD, CASE WHEN CAST(MAX(A.SFN) AS CHAR(1)) = 'Y' THEN '1' ELSE '0' END SFN, MAX(A.TL1) TL1, MAX(A.TL2) TL2, MAX(A.TL3) TL3, MAX(A.EOE) EOE, (SELECT MAX(NAME1) FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT012 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND LIFNR = MAX(A.EOE)) ENM, MAX(A.EPN) EPN, MAX(A.RMK) RMK FROM ( SELECT A.CS126_UPN UPN, A.CS126_CST CST, A.CS126_PJT PJT, A.CS126_HNO HNO, B.VKGRP, SAPHEE.CODE_CONV(A.MANDT,'VKGRP',B.VKGRP) VKGRP_NM, A.CS126_ARA ARA, SAPHEE.CODE_CONV(A.MANDT,'CS115',A.CS126_ARA) ARA_NM, A.CS126_BSU BSU, SAPHEE.GET_VENDER_N_NAME(A.MANDT,A.CS126_BSU) BSU_NM, 1 CNT, C.CS121_SPT SPT, C.CS121_P1C || ' ' || C.CS121_P2C ADR, A.CS126_GNO GNO, A.CS126_ADT ADT, A.CS126_USD USD, A.CS126_UMR UMR, E.ZBEPJEO RDT, '임대' CTP, A.CS126_JUJ JUJ, VALUE(D.USERNAME,'') JUJ_NM, 1 MC1, 0 MC2, 0 NETWR, VALUE(G.CS305_SDT, '') SDT, VALUE(G.CS305_ETP, '') ETP, VALUE(G.CS305_CMD, '') CMD, VALUE(G.CS305_SFN, '') SFN, VALUE(G.CS305_TL1, '') TL1, VALUE(G.CS305_TL2, '') TL2, VALUE(G.CS305_TL3, '') TL3, VALUE(G.CS305_EOE, '') EOE, VALUE(G.CS305_EPN, '') EPN, VALUE(G.CS305_RMK, '') RMK FROM SAPHEE.ZCST126 A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZUSERF D ON D.MANDT = A.MANDT AND D.USERNUMB = A.CS126_JUJ LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST305 G ON G.MANDT = A.MANDT AND G.CS305_UPN = A.CS126_UPN AND G.CS305_CST = A.CS126_CST AND G.CS305_PJT = A.CS126_PJT AND G.CS305_HNO = A.CS126_HNO AND G.CS305_GNO = A.CS126_GNO, SAPHEE.ZWBT010 B, SAPHEE.ZCST121 C, SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 E WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.CS126_BSU = B.LGORT AND A.MANDT = C.MANDT AND A.CS126_UPN = C.CS121_UPN AND A.CS126_CST = C.CS121_CST AND A.MANDT = E.MANDT AND A.CS126_PJT = E.POSID AND A.CS126_PJT || A.CS126_HNO = E.POSID_1
AND A.CS126_ARA = #ARA#
AND A.CS126_BSU = #BSU#
AND A.CS126_BPM = #BPM#
AND B.VKGRP = #TEM#
AND A.CS126_GND = 'D' AND A.CS126_DDT = '' AND A.CS126_PST = 'A6' AND A.CS126_SLA = 'N' AND A.CS126_DYN = 'Y' AND A.CS126_FDG = 'Y' AND SUBSTR(A.CS126_HNO,1,1) IN ('L','S','W') AND A.CS126_ADT BETWEEN #FYM# AND #TYM# -- AND HEX(CURRENT DATE) BETWEEN A.CS126_USD AND A.CS126_UMR AND B.LGORT > '' AND C.CS121_CST > '' ) A WHERE 1=1
AND 1=1
AND 1=2
GROUP BY A.UPN, A.CST, A.PJT, A.HNO, A.VKGRP, A.ARA, A.BSU, A.GNO
UNION ALL
SELECT '' CHK, '' FLAG, A.UPN, A.CST, A.PJT, A.HNO, A.VKGRP, A.VKGRP_NM, A.ARA, A.ARA_NM, A.BSU, A.BSU_NM, A.MRC1 CNT, A.SPT, A.ADR, A.GNO, A.ADT, A.USD, A.UMR, A.RDT, A.CTP, A.JUJ, A.JUJ_NM, A.MRC0 MC0, 0 MC1, A.MRC1 MC2, 0 NTR, A.SDT, A.ETP, A.CMD, CASE WHEN CAST(A.SFN AS CHAR(1)) = 'Y' THEN '1' ELSE '0' END SFN, A.TL1, A.TL2, A.TL3, A.EOE, (SELECT MAX(NAME1) FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT012 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND LIFNR = A.EOE) ENM, A.EPN, A.RMK FROM ( SELECT MAX(A.UPN) UPN, MAX(A.CST) CST, A.PJT PJT, A.HNO HNO, A.VKGRP VKGRP, MAX(A.VKGRP_NM) VKGRP_NM, A.ARA ARA, MAX(A.ARA_NM) ARA_NM, A.BSU BSU, MAX(A.BSU_NM) BSU_NM, 0 CNT, MAX(A.SPT) SPT, MAX(A.ADR) ADR, A.GNO GNO, MAX(A.ADT) ADT, '' USD, '' UMR, MAX(A.RDT) RDT, MAX(A.CTP) CTP, MAX(A.JUJ) JUJ, MAX(A.JUJ_NM) JUJ_NM, MAX(A.MRC0) MRC0, MAX(A.MRC1) MRC1, MAX(A.MRC2) MRC2, MAX(A.MRC3) MRC3, MAX(A.MRC4) MRC4, VALUE(MAX(B.CS305_SDT), '') SDT, VALUE(MAX(B.CS305_ETP), '') ETP, VALUE(MAX(B.CS305_CMD), '') CMD, VALUE(MAX(B.CS305_SFN), '') SFN, VALUE(MAX(B.CS305_TL1), '') TL1, VALUE(MAX(B.CS305_TL2), '') TL2, VALUE(MAX(B.CS305_TL3), '') TL3, VALUE(MAX(B.CS305_EOE), '') EOE, VALUE(MAX(B.CS305_EPN), '') EPN, VALUE(MAX(B.CS305_RMK), '') RMK, MAX(A.REQNR) REQNR, MAX(A.REQITEM) REQITEM FROM (
SELECT '' UPN, '' CST, SUBSTR(H.POSID,1,6) PJT, SUBSTR(H.POSID,7,3) HNO, B.VKGRP, SAPHEE.CODE_CONV(A.MANDT,'VKGRP',B.VKGRP) VKGRP_NM, B.BSU_ARA ARA, SAPHEE.CODE_CONV(B.MANDT,'CS115',B.BSU_ARA) ARA_NM, A.LGORT BSU, SAPHEE.GET_VENDER_N_NAME(A.MANDT,A.LGORT) BSU_NM, 0 CNT, C.ZSITE_NM SPT, C.ADDR1 || ' ' || C.ADDR2 ADR, A.PS_PSP_PNR GNO, A.BUDAT3 ADT, '' USD, '' UMR, D.ZBEPJEO RDT, '판매' CTP, E.JUJ, VALUE(F.USERNAME,'') JUJ_NM, A.MENGE MRC0, CASE WHEN A.MATNR IN ('291100075','291100076','291100077','291100078','291100079','291100080','291100081','291100082','291100083','291100084') THEN A.MENGE ELSE 0 END MRC1, CASE WHEN A.MATNR IN ('291100118','291100121') THEN A.MENGE ELSE 0 END MRC2, CASE WHEN A.MATNR IN ('291001086') THEN A.MENGE ELSE 0 END MRC3, CASE WHEN A.MATNR IN ('291100093','291100108') THEN A.MENGE ELSE 0 END MRC4, A.REQNR, A.REQITEM FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT001 AS A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT031 H ON H.MANDT = A.MANDT AND H.REQNR = A.REQNR AND H.MATNR = A.MATNR LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST001 G ON G.MANDT = H.MANDT AND G.QTNUM = H.QTNUM AND G.REQNR = H.REQNR LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST111 E ON E.MANDT= H.MANDT AND E.PJT = SUBSTR(H.POSID,1,6) AND E.PJT||E.HNO = H.POSID LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 D ON D.MANDT = E.MANDT AND D.POSID = E.PJT AND D.POSID_1 = E.PJT || E.HNO INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 C ON C.MANDT = D.MANDT AND C.POSID = D.POSID LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZUSERF F ON F.MANDT = E.MANDT AND F.USERNUMB = E.JUJ INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZWBT010 B ON B.MANDT = A.MANDT AND B.LGORT = A.LGORT WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND SUBSTR(A.PS_PSP_PNR,7,1) = 'N' AND A.MATNR IN ('291100075','291100076','291100077','291100078','291100079','291100080','291100081','291100082','291100083','291100084','291100118','291100121','291001086','291100093','291100108') AND A.BUDAT3 BETWEEN #FYM# AND #TYM# AND A.DEL_DATE = '00000000'
AND B.BSU_ARA = #ARA#
AND B.LGORT = #BSU#
AND B.BSU_PM = #BPM#
AND B.VKGRP = #TEM#
) A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST305 B ON B.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND B.CS305_PJT = A.PJT AND B.CS305_HNO = A.HNO AND B.CS305_GNO = A.GNO GROUP BY A.PJT, A.HNO, A.VKGRP, A.ARA, A.BSU, A.GNO ) A WHERE 1=1
AND 1=2
AND 1=1
AND (INT(A.MRC1) > 0 AND (INT(A.MRC2) > 0 OR INT(A.MRC3) > 0 OR INT(A.MRC4) > 0))
FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
